title: State Department will delete X posts from before Trump returned to office
description: The policy change orders the removal of any post made by official State Department accounts on X before President Trump returned to office in 2025.
content: The policy change orders the removal of any post made by official State Department accounts on X before President Trump returned to office in 2025.
